title: Homepage
cleaned_text:
Sep 2021 – Exciting new publication by our Medical Director Dr. Akbar Khan in the new Canadian Journal of Naturopathic Medicine! Read this revealing paper about the realities of cytotoxic chemotherapy for advanced colon cancer. Get the facts before you decide if chemo is right for you.

Critical Appraisal of Approved Chemotherapy Regimens for Advanced Colon Cancer in Ontario Canada. Khan A, Can J Naturopathic Med, Vol 1, Issue 2, Sep 2021
